abstract: Highlights from the bill’s provisions, some of which are permanent and far-reaching.
snippet: Highlights from the bill’s provisions, some of which are permanent and far-reaching.
lead_paragraph: 1:56 p.m. | Updated The Small Business Jobs Act of 2010 — as detailed below — passed the Senate on Thursday by a vote of 61 to 38. Two Republicans, Sen. George Voinovich of Ohio and Sen. George LeMieux of Florida voted with the Democratic majority.

headline.main: What the Latest Senate Small-Business Jobs Bill Offers
